resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108165</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108165</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087576</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">National Educational Computing Conference (NECC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nationale Pädagogisches Rechnenkonferenz (NECC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conférence Nationale d'Informatique Éducative 
(NECC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conferência Nacional Computar Educacional (NECC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Congresso Nazionale Di Computazione Educativa 
(NECC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθνική εκπαιδευτική διάσκεψη υπολογισμού (NECC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conferencia Nacional El Computar Educativo (NECC)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">NECC is the premier forum in which to learn, exchange, and survey the field of educational technology. This annual conference features hands-on workshops, lecture-format and interactive concurrent sessions, discussions with key industry leaders, and the largest educational technology exhibit in the world.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">NECC ist das Premierforum, in dem auffangene 
der pädagogischen Technologie erlernen, austauschen und überblicken.
Diese Jahreskonferenz kennzeichnet Blindeinschub Werkstätten, 
Vortrag-Format und interaktive gleichzeitige Sitzungen, Diskussionen 
mit Schlüsselindustrieführern und die größte pädagogische 
Technologieausstellung in der Welt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">NECC est le forum de premier ministre dans lequel 
pour apprendre, permuter, et examiner la zone de la technologie 
éducative. Cette conférence annuelle comporte les ateliers à 
commande manuelle, le conférence-format et les sessions concourantes 
interactives, les discussions avec les leaders de l'industrie 
principaux, et le plus grand objet exposé éducatif de technologie 
dans le monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">NECC é o forum do premier em que para aprender, 
trocar, e examinar o campo da tecnologia educacional. Esta 
conferência anual caracteriza oficinas hands-on, lecture-formato e 
sessões simultâneas interativas, discussões com os líderes de 
indústria chave, e a exibição educacional a maior da tecnologia no 
mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">NECC è la tribuna di primo ministro in cui imparare,
scambiare ed esaminare il campo di tecnologia educativa. Questo 
congresso annuale caratterizza i workshop hands-on, conferenza-formato
e sessioni simultanee interattive, discussioni con i capi di 
industria chiave e la più grande esposizione educativa di tecnologia 
nel mondo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">NECC είναι το αρχαιότερο φόρουμ στο οποίο να 
μάθει, να ανταλλάξει, και να ερευνήσει το πεδίο της εκπαιδευτικής
τεχνολογίας. Αυτή η ετήσια διάσκεψη χαρακτηρίζει τα 
εμπράγματα εργαστήρια, την διάλεξη-μορφή και τις διαλογικές 
ταυτόχρονες περιόδους επικοινωνίας, τις συζητήσεις με τα 
διευθυντικά στελέχη βασικής βιομηχανίας, και το μεγαλύτερο 
εκπαιδευτικό έκθεμα τεχνολογίας στον κόσμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">NECC es el foro del primero ministro en el cual 
aprender, intercambiar, y examinar el campo de la tecnología 
educativa. Esta conferencia anual ofrece talleres con manos, 
conferencia-formato y las sesiones simultáneas interactivas, las 
discusiones con los arranques de cinta de industria dominante, y el 
objeto expuesto educativo más grande de la tecnología del mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087576</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108165</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/necc</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
